Richardson.Dallas Midtown:
Valley View Center is a super-regional shopping mall located at Interstate 635 and Preston Road in north Dallas, Texas, USA. It is owned and managed by Dallas-based Beck Ventures. The mall has an AMC Theatres, the only anchor remaining in operation.
Originally developed in 1973, the mall flourished and expanded in the 1980s, but began to encounter financial difficulties in the 1990s.
